message: Error with padding. Perhaps the input was not interpreted as a string.

Error checking connectives between parentheses. Your expression was probably not well-formed, likely due to forgetting to wrap the binary expressions in parentheses, or wrapping a unary operator with them. Consult the README for the grammar of a well-formed formula.
Error validating opening and closing parentheses. Check to ensure that you have the same number of opening and closing parentheses in your expression.
Error evaluating one side of an expression clause. Check to ensure that your expression is a well-formed formula.
Error parsing given boolean expression. Check your expression and ensure it is well-formed.
Error grabbing variables from boolean expression. Ensure that your expression is well-formed and has variable names that are distinct from unary and binary operators.
Error generating true-false values for given number. Ensure that the number is a positive integer.
Error assigning true-false values to set of variables.
Error evaluating boolean statement, make sure you entered a valid binary operation (and, or, xor, nand, nor, xnor) or valid unary operation (not).
Error evaluating parse tree, something went wrong!

Error evaluating parse tree, your formula is not well formed! This is likely due to forgetting to wrap the binary expressions in parentheses, or wrapping a unary operator with them. Consult the README to find the grammar for a well-formed forumla.
Error evaluating boolean expression, something went wrong!
Error getting subcomponent for a circuit.
